curated_text: Symbol: ABBV. Year: 2022. Period: Q2. ReportType: Q10. Section: Competition and Market Position. This section discusses competitors, market dynamics, and regulatory landscape.  Competitors mentioned: the California Business and Professions Code, AndroGel, King Drug Co., Florence, Inc., Solvay Pharmaceuticals, Inc., Abbott, sham litigation, Perrigo Company, Abbott’s, Perrigo, Humira, Adalimumab, Antitrust Litigation, Forest Laboratories, LLC, Forest, Namenda, Allergan Inc., the U.S. Patent Office and Food and Drug Administration, Restasis, Bystolic Antitrust Litigation, MDL, Prescription Opiate Litigation, the State of West Virginia, State of New Mexico, Balderas v. AbbVie Inc., New Mexico’s Unfair Practices Act, the New Mexico False Advertising Act, Shareholder and Securities Litigation, Elliott Associates, Illinois Circuit Court, Shire, the Illinois Appellate Court, the New York Supreme Court, the Supreme Court of New York, Appellate Division, Holwill, Delaware Chancery Court, Allergan plc Securities Litigation, Nakata, the Food and Drug Administration’s, Treppel Family Trust, the U.S. Patent Office, Intellectual Property Litigation Pharmacyclics LLC, Alvogen Pine Brook LLC, Allergan USA, Inc., Forest Laboratories Holdings Limited, Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Limited, Sun Pharma Global FZE, Aurobindo Pharma Limited, Zydus Pharmaceuticals, Cadila Healthcare Limited, Plc, Inc., Vraylar, CODM, Hematologic Oncology Imbruvica, Vraylar United States, Eye Care Lumigan/Ganfort United States, Linzess/Constella United, ANALYSIS OF FINANCIAL CONDITION, AbbVie Inc., the Condensed Consolidated Financial Statements, Supplementary Data, North Atlantic Treaty Organization, Botox, COVID-19, Research and Development Research, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration, FDA, New Drug Application, NSAIDs, bVie, the European Commission, EC, the European Medicines Agency, EMA, JAK, U-Excel, Rinvoq, TNF, U-ENDURE, MAA, Breakthrough Therapy Designation, Imbruvica •, Genmab A/S (Genmab, DuoBody-CD3xCD20, Eye Care Vuity •, the Phase 3, Vuity, Percent, United States, Imbruvica, Venclexta, CLL, Botox Cosmetic, Juvederm Collection, Botox Therapeutic, SG&A, litigation reserve, Syndesi Therapeutics SA, Consolidated Financial Statements, Non-Operating Expenses (Income, LIQUIDITY, Credit Risk AbbVie. Context excerpt: competition provision of the California Business and Professions Code seeking injunctive relief, restitution, civil penalties and attorneys’ fees. In August 2019, direct purchasers of AndroGel filed a lawsuit, King Drug Co. of Florence, Inc., et al. v. AbbVie Inc., et al., against AbbVie and others in the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania, alleging that 2006 patent litigation settlements and related agreements by Solvay Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (a company Abbott acquired in February 2010 and now known as AbbVie Products LLC) with three generic companies violated federal antitrust law, and also alleging that 2011 patent litigation by Abbott with two generic companies regarding AndroGel was sham litigation and the settlements of those litigations violated federal antitrust law. Plaintiffs generally seek monetary damages and/or injunctive relief and attorneys’ fees. In May 2020, Perrigo Company and related entities filed a lawsuit against AbbVie and others
